thread.title: Girl is beaten and arrested by Iran's 'morality police' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Girl is beaten and arrested by Iran's 'morality police' | Daily Mail Online

author: Thomas Burrows For Mailonline
title: Girl is beaten and arrested by Iran's 'morality police' | Daily Mail Online
text: Girl, 14, is beaten and arrested by Iran's 'morality police' for wearing ripped jeans Girl was celebrating her birthday with friends when they were hauled into a van Male officers had threatened them with pepper spray to force them into vehicle Once inside, they were beaten by female officers who also pulled their hair Girls were only released after being made to sign written pledges that they would not wear the ripped trousers again and adhere to country's strict dress
